test_message: Show me available study groups for Data Structures, upcoming class events this week, and my performance benchmark compared to peers.
expected_purpose: Manages peer updates, shared calendars, study groups, and benchmarks

benchmarks.notes: Your performance is above the peer average. Consistency in quiz participation is helping boost your percentile.

recommendations: Consider joining the Linked Lists & Trees group for collaborative learning this week.
Continue attending lectures and quizzes for sustained improvement.
Share study notes and resources within your group to help peers.
